text: Erin Brockovich is a 2000 American docudrama movie. It stars Julia Roberts as environmental activist Erin Brockovich. It is about Brockovich's legal actions in California against companies there in the 1990s. This movie was nominated for several Academy Awards. Roberts won an Academy Award and a Golden Globe Award for her role. In the movie, the real Erin Brockovich has a cameo appearance as a waitress named Julia. ==References== == Other websites == * Category:2000 drama movies Category:2000s biographical movies Category:Academy Award winning movies Category:American biographical movies Category:American drama movies Category:American legal movies Category:English-language movies Category:Feminist movies Category:Golden Globe Award winning movies Category:Movies set in California Category:Movies set in the 1990s Category:Movies directed by Steven Soderbergh
title: Erin Brockovich (movie)
